---
title: "pathway view"
output:
  html_notebook:
    code_folding: hide
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = F, message = F)
library(pathview)
```

### load data 

* row -> ko id 
* col -> two groups foldchange or z score value 
```{r}
kof <- read.table("ETB.wilcox.m6")
```

### generate png
```{r}
prf <- kof[, 5, F] 
p <- pathview(gene.data = prf,       # row->KO id; col -> z-score
              pathway.id = "00650",  # pathway number 
              species = "ko",        # species type  
              gene.idtype = "kegg",  # kegg 
              out.suffix = "ETB")    # output suffix
p
```
